Bonus*:

1. Human Nature - 7" Remix (3:47)
2. Wanna Be Startin' Somethin' - 7" Edit (4:20)

*These are the actual versions replaced by the "fake edits". Human Nature - 7" Remix was only available on the QOBUZ Edition of "The Essential Michael Jackson". Wanna Be Startin' Somethin' - 7" Edit was included on several versions of the "King Of Pop" album. This one is from the UK Edition.
